category: Other Disease of Public Health Importance

case_definition.suspected: Fever with two or more of headache, retro-orbital pain, myalgia, rash, or hemorrhagic manifestations.
case_definition.probable: Suspected case with epidemiologic link and supportive serology.
case_definition.confirmed: Detection of dengue virus via PCR or NS1 antigen test.

public_health_actions: Collect blood sample for PCR or NS1
Implement vector control and case monitoring
Public health awareness on mosquito prevention
lab_confirmation: RT-PCR, NS1 antigen, or IgM serology.
